page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There are not many sources of public entertainment in our area. There is a{ {Bingo Hall}in East Tilbury which holds competitions every week. The{cinema}is there too and is quite large with two screens. There is a{library}in Chadwell and also a{WorkingMans' Club}.There is a variety of pubs, too. Each area also has its own{Village {Hall}or{Community Centre}which organise classes for learning new skills,keep-fit,dancing, and sports. They also organise social evenings.There is also Scouts, et al., Youth Clubs, Church associations, and so on. For more public entertainment it is possible to travel to{Grays,or Basildon.There are also thriving and numerous video shops.
